name: Stacker
headline: Turns spreadsheets into internal apps and customer portals
description:
We let you create applications for your team, your partners or your customers, powered by the data you're already using.

Connect in your spreadsheets, Airtable or database and we'll automatically create an app for you.

founders.name: Michael Skelly, Founder
founders.description:
Narcoleptic Brit from Northumberland living in London.

CS at Oxford. AI at Imperial. Pistols at Dawn.

I like cryptic crosswords, no code, and calligraphy. Working on combining all three.

founders.name: Sam Davyson, Founder
founders.description: Physics at Cambridge. Worked for ~ 10 years in the Salesforce ecosystem in Finance, Events, and NGOs before founding Stacker convinced there must be a better way to create business software. British but left the UK 10 yrs ago for Switzerland and settled in Geneva. Married and have 3 beautiful kids. Love mountains and swimming in cold lakes.
